name: Piipa
description:
In this kite fight, make your enemies shoot one another as you dodge bullets and hack enemies to shield your way to a new highscore! (for now)

[WARNING] File size may be a bit too big for web (~20mb), thanks for being patient.

INSTRUCTIONS:
WASD - Rotation, Acceleration and Halt.
LeftShift - Dash (when the player's kite is green).
Hacking happens when you're close to the enemy Tigers.
Keep the combo up!

We'll be updating this game a little further. Roadmap includes:
